title: Federal Legislative Representative Services For Investments
text:
Federal Legislative Representative Services For Investments



The California Public Employees’ Retirement System is seeking proposals from qualified firms with demonstrated expertise in providing effective representation in Washington, D.C. The potential contractor should have experience working with public employers, a strong understanding of public retirement plans, financial markets, corporate governance, and familiarity with the California Congressional Delegation.



To view the CalPERS Federal Legislative Representative Services for Investments Request for Proposal No. 2019-8700:



Visit the CalPERS website at https://www.calpers.ca.gov/page/about/doing-business-with-calpers/bid-op... to see if the solicitation is of interest to you and follow the process to register.



If the solicitation is of no interest to you, you can register as a CalPERS eBusiness Partner in specific business categories and will be notified when a solicitation is posted in that category. Please visit our website at https://www.calpers.ca.gov/page/about/doing-business-with-calpers.



Please reference the Request for Proposal for the Final Filing Date.



Serving those who serve California
